comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: Charlie's Tavern was at 788 7th Avenue (@ 51st Street), on the rear side of the old Roseland Ballroom, which was established in 1919 and torn down in 1956 when the Roseland moved to its current location a block away. The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel (formerly the Sheraton Manhattan) is there now. More old photos of Charlie's can be found at www.billcrowbass.com/Pages/biography.htm
